#VAR var upgrades = game.getPlayerCell().getPlace().getPlaceUpgrades(); #ENDVAR #IF(upgrades.contains(PLACE_UPGRADE_LILAYA_MILKING_ROOM_ARTISAN_MILKERS))

#ELSE

#ENDIF

Before you know it, an hour has passed, and after reaching over to flick the switch off, you unstrap yourself and stand up.
